name: Solid Soccer Cup
description:
Swipe to pass, tackle and shoot in this action-packed arcade football game. Beat the opposition to advance in the cup toward the final! You might easily beat Andorra in the first match, but watch out for Uruguay in the 8th-final! Even if you have a well-trained team, you will need all the luck and skill you can muster.

Features:
• Build a strong team – train your 11 team players and make them even better.
• Earn Training Points and train your players.
• Win powerful Star Players to boost your team.
• Collect Trophies and help your nation advance in the ranking list.

What are you waiting for? Take the challenge and honor your country, getting them the trophies they deserve!
